channel.title: Sign up then log in Don't know how to do it please help!
channel.description: Hello people, I have server called Bass-Scape that is not realy big right now... And a lot of people are logging in and then quitting 2 weeks later and i have all these files in the character folder and i don't know which ones are valid bass-scape players and which ones are 5 minute quitters. And so i heard that you can integrate your server. "Bass"ically, this means you have to sign up before you play and not just any random username or password. Anybody know how. BTW i haven't really tried because i have no idea like even where to start to do this. If one of the requirements is a website, i have that.

item.title: Sign up then log in Don't know how to do it please help!
item.dc:creator: @antcolony3 antcolony3
item.description:
@antcolony3 wrote:

whats that?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 19, 2008, 10:29:00 am[/size][hr]does anyone actually know how to make it so you sign up to log in without just making up a user and pass?

Read full topic
item.source: Sign up then log in Don't know how to do it please help!
